description: Our chapter operates with the following organizational structure:
meetingsInfo: We hold general membership meetings monthly and steering committee meetings bi-weekly. All meetings are open to members, and meeting minutes are made available to ensure transparency.

generalMembership.description: All dues-paying members have voting rights at general meetings
generalMembership.title: General Membership

steeringCommittee.description: Elected officers who coordinate chapter activities
steeringCommittee.title: Steering Committee

workingGroups.description: Focus on specific campaigns and chapter operations
workingGroups.title: Working Groups & Committees

title: Chapter Structure
